message.body: I love you so much Martha. I know you'll be ok. Its just really stressful right now. Just remember to take one thing at a time and that if you make a mistake apologize and move on.you're very smart and more than competent. You are ok. In the next couple of days well talk again and then you can make some decisions. I love you. Shannon
Please let me know that you are ok. No matter what time it is.
Hard, overwhelming, counting on learning a lot fast
You will. Be patient with yourself.i love you. Papa had out patient surgery today for a bladder stone.all went well Shannon
